item.title: HBO Max Scores Record Emmy Nominations Haul Fueled by ‘The Penguin,’ ‘The White Lotus,’ ‘The Last of Us’ and ‘Hacks’
item.description: HBO Max stomped the yard on Emmy nominations morning with a record haul of 142, led by drama series “The Penguin,” “The White Lotus,” “The Last of Us” and comedy &#
